item.title: 日本任天堂维持年度利润，硬件预测
item.description: 日本任天堂公司周二维持其年度营业利润预测为3700亿日元（约合24亿美元），较上一财年增长近三分之一。【原文：Japan's Nintendo on Tuesday maintained its annual operating profit forecast of 370 billion yen ($2.4 billion), an increase of nearly a third over the previous financial year.】

item.title: 日本首相关于日元贬值的闲谈令财政官僚们措手不及
item.description: 就在日本终于在遏制日元急剧贬值的漫长艰苦斗争中取得进展之际，其首相却抛出新的挑战——他即兴的言论对日元疲软给出了另一种解读。【原文：Just as Japan was finally gaining ground in its long, hard fight to stop sharp currency falls, a fresh challenge has emerged from its own prime minister, whose off-the-cuff comments tell a different story about yen weakness.】

item.title: 世通科技初步业绩超预期，但警示2026年将走弱
item.description: 德国半导体晶圆供应商世创电子周二公布初步第四季度业绩，其核心利润和营收均超出市场预期。【原文：German semiconductor wafer supplier Siltronic on Tuesday reported preliminary fourth-quarter results with core profit and revenue beating market expectations.】

item.title: 安盛投资管理业绩超预期，CEO称客户寻求美元避险
item.description: 欧洲最大资产管理公司安盛投资管理周二公布，其第四季度净流入资金超出预期。该公司首席执行官表示，客户正寻求在欧洲实现多元化配置，并减少美元资产持有。【原文：Europe's largest asset manager, Amundi , on Tuesday reported higher-than-expected net inflows in the fourth-quarter, and the CEO said clients were seeking diversification in Europe and away from the U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 从"完美契合"到告别：价格保证如何促成皮诺退出彪马
item.description: 弗朗索瓦-亨利·皮诺上周以18亿美元将家族持有的彪马控股权出售给中国安踏时，或许未能如愿以偿。但据两位知情人士透露，这笔交易附带一项关键条款：一项"避免难堪"的保密协议。【原文：François-Henri Pinault may not have got as much as he wanted when he sold his family's controlling stake in Puma to China's Anta for $1.8 billion last week. But, according to two sources close to the matter, the deal came with a deal-sealing sweetener: an "anti-embarrassment" clause.】

item.title: 早盘行情：特朗普取消印度协议，澳大利亚加息
item.description: 汤姆·韦斯特布鲁克带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 顶级咨询公司通过中国业务变通方案挑战边界
item.description: 面对充满挑战的地缘政治环境，全球咨询公司正转向更具风险的在华经营方式。一些行业和法律专家指出，这些做法正在挑战西方制裁的边界，同时也触及北京限制外国企业涉足敏感领域的政策底线。【原文：Faced with a fraught geopolitical environment, global consultancies are turning to riskier ways to do business in China that some industry and legal experts say test the boundaries of Western sanctions and Beijing's drive to curb foreign involvement in sensitive sectors.】

item.title: 印度同意从美国购买石油、国防产品和飞机，官方称
item.description: 印度政府官员周二向路透社透露，印度已同意根据一项贸易协议，从美国购买石油、国防产品、电子产品、医药和电信产品以及飞机。【原文：India has agreed to buy petroleum, defence goods, electronics, pharma and telecom products as well as aircraft from the U.S. under a trade deal, a government official told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚两年内首次加息，市场押注五月将再升息
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二上调基准政策利率，这是该行两年来的首次加息。央行表示，经济增长速度快于预期，通胀率在一段时间内可能持续高于目标水平。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday raised its benchmark policy rate for the first time in two years, saying the economy was growing faster than expected and inflation was likely to remain above target for some time.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行预计通胀率将上升，即便在2026年加息两次的情况下亦是如此。
item.description: 悉尼2月3日（路透社）——澳大利亚央行周二上调了经济增长和通胀预期，同时警告经济活动已触及增长上限，需要再加息几次才能使经济回归平衡。【原文：SYDNEY, Feb 3 (Reuters) - Australia's central bank on Tuesday raised its forecasts for economic growth and inflation, warning that activity was hitting speed limits and a couple of increases in interest rates would be needed to bring it back into balance.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳洲航空将退出捷星日本业务，专注于国内航线运营
item.description: 澳洲航空周二宣布将出售旗下廉价航空捷星日本的股权，以专注于核心国内业务。这家澳大利亚国家航空公司正面临企业需求疲软和燃油成本上升的双重压力。【原文：Qantas Airways said on Tuesday it would sell its stake in low-cost carrier Jetstar Japan to focus on its core domestic offerings as the Australian flag carrier faces softer corporate demand and higher fuel costs.】

item.title: 丰田供应商电装因成本上升大幅下调全年营业利润预期
item.description: 日本电装公司——丰田汽车的主要零部件供应商——大幅下调全年营业利润预期近五分之一，反映出美国进口关税的拖累以及原材料和固定成本上涨带来的冲击。【原文：Japan's Denso , a major auto parts supplier to Toyota , slashed its full-year operating profit forecast by nearly a fifth reflecting drag from U.S. import tariffs and a hit from rising material and fixed costs.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称SpaceX与xAI确定换股比例为0.1433
item.description: 知情人士周一透露，作为卫星公司收购亿万富翁企业家埃隆·马斯克旗下人工智能公司xAI的一部分，投资者将按每持有一股xAI股票可获得0.1433股SpaceX股票的比例进行兑换。【原文：Investors in Elon Musk's xAI will receive 0.1433 shares of SpaceX for every share of xAI as part of the satellite company's purchase of the billionaire entrepreneur's artificial intelligence company, a source familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在美国推出新款Model Y车型，售价41,990美元
item.description: 特斯拉官网周一显示，这家电动汽车制造商在美国推出新款Model Y车型，售价为41,990美元。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Tesla introduced a new variant of its Model Y vehicle in the United States priced at $41,990, the company's website showed on Monday.】

item.title: 油价持稳，因市场考虑美伊局势可能缓和，美元坚挺
item.description: 周二油价持稳，因市场参与者权衡美伊紧张局势缓和的可能，而美元走强限制了油价上涨空间。【原文：Oil prices held steady on Tuesday as market participants weighed the possibility of a de-escalation in U.S.-Iran tensions, with a firmer dollar limiting the upside.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，金价在平缓交易中反弹
item.description: 周二，黄金和亚洲股市出现反弹，此前金属市场经历剧烈波动后，交易氛围趋于平静。美国制造业活动隔夜大幅攀升提振了市场情绪。【原文：Gold and Asian stocks were on the rebound on Tuesday as trade took a calmer tone after wild swings in metals markets, with the mood helped overnight by a sharp jump in U.S. factory activity.】

item.title: 美元因经济数据和美联储押注而保持涨势；澳元在澳储行决议前走高
item.description: 周二美元延续涨势，因积极的经济数据和美联储政策预期转变，抵消了市场对美国政府再次停摆的担忧。【原文：The dollar held gains on Tuesday as positive economic readings and shifting expectations for Federal Reserve policy outweighed concerns about another U.S. government shutdown.】

item.title: 谷歌云与自由环球达成五年期人工智能合作协议
item.description: 谷歌云作为Alphabet旗下增长最快的业务之一，已与自由环球达成五年战略合作协议，将在该有线电视集团的欧洲业务中部署谷歌Gemini人工智能模型及其他云端工具。【原文：Google Cloud, one of Alphabet's fastest-growing businesses, and Liberty Global have agreed a five-year strategic partnership to deploy Google's Gemini AI models and other cloud tools across the cable group's European operations.】

item.title: 环保组织称欧盟拟自2035年起限制电动汽车销售
item.description: 清洁交通倡导组织T&E表示，根据欧盟计划取消对新型燃油车实质性禁令的方案，到2035年电动汽车可能占欧盟新车销量的85%，但该比例也可能降至50%。【原文：Electric vehicles are likely to make up 85% of new car sales in the EU from 2035, based on its plans to drop an effective ban on new combustion-engine models, although that share could drop as low as 50%, clean transport advocacy group T&E said.】

item.title: 恩智浦半导体预测季度业绩向好，预示工业市场触底反弹
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司周一预测其第一季度营收将超出华尔街预期，预计汽车市场将保持强劲，工业需求将持续稳定。【原文：NXP Semiconductors on Monday forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates, anticipating a robust automotive market and consistent industrial demand.】

item.title: 加州2亿美元电动汽车激励计划将要求汽车制造商提供等额资金
item.description: 加州州长加文·纽森的政府周一表示，该州拟议的2亿美元电动汽车激励计划将仅限于首次购车者，并要求参与制造商提供等额补贴。【原文：California's proposed $200 million electric vehicle incentive program will be limited to first-time buyers and require participating manufacturers to contribute matching incentives, the administration of California Governor Gavin Newsom said on Monday.】

item.title: 泰瑞达预测人工智能驱动需求将带来乐观季度业绩
item.description: 泰瑞达周一公布的季度营收和利润预期均高于华尔街预期，主要得益于科技公司为扩展数据中心以支持人工智能能力投入数十亿美元的投资，推动其股价在盘后交易中上涨逾20%。【原文：Teradyne forecast first-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Monday, driven by multibillion-dollar investments by technology companies on data center expansion to enable AI capabilities, sending its shares up over 20% in extended trading.】

item.title: Waymo在最新融资中估值达1260亿美元，自动驾驶出租车业务正加速发展
item.description: 谷歌旗下自动驾驶公司Waymo宣布，在最新一轮融资中筹集了160亿美元资金，使这家自动驾驶初创企业的估值达到1260亿美元，在不到两年的时间里估值几乎翻了三倍。【原文：Alphabet unit Waymo said it had raised $16 billion in its latest fundraising round that valued the self-driving car startup at $126 billion, nearly tripling its valuation in less than two years.】

item.title: 交易日 硬资产上的坚实数据
item.description: 华尔街对上周贵金属的历史性抛售不以为意，周一抛售仍在持续，而美元再度走强——投资者受到强劲的美国及全球制造业数据、企业盈利以及美伊关系明显缓和的提振。【原文：Wall Street shrugged off last week's historic selloff in precious metals, which continued on Monday, and the dollar rose again as investors took their cue from strong U.S. and global manufacturing data, earnings, and an apparent detente between the U.S. and Iran.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布建立关键矿产储备
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周一宣布建立关键矿产储备。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday announced the creation of a critical mineral reserve.】

item.title: 独家：福特铝材供应商九月火灾后仍未全面恢复生产
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，福特汽车供应商诺维利斯公司的铝材生产至今仍未完全恢复。四个月前，一场毁灭性火灾导致该公司向福特利润丰厚的皮卡车供应的金属材料中断。【原文：Production of aluminum at Ford Motor supplier Novelis still has not fully resumed more than four months after a devastating fire disrupted supply of the metal to Ford's lucrative pickup trucks, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: SpaceX收购xAI，马斯克谋求整合人工智能与太空雄心
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克周一宣布，SpaceX已收购其人工智能初创公司xAI。此次将火箭卫星公司与Grok聊天机器人的制造商合并，旨在整合马斯克在人工智能与太空领域的雄心。【原文：Elon Musk said on Monday that SpaceX has acquired his artificial-intelligence startup xAI, combining the rocket-and-satellite company with the maker of the Grok chatbot in a move aimed at unifying Musk's AI and space ambitions.】

item.title: Palantir首席执行官为监控技术辩护，美国政府合同推动销售增长
item.description: 帕兰蒂尔公司首席执行官亚历克斯·卡普在公司销售额大幅增长之际，为该公司的监控技术辩护，称其设有保障措施以防止政府越权，但未提及在明尼苏达州引发广泛抗议的移民执法行动。【原文：Palantir CEO Alex Karp defended the firm's surveillance technology as it reported a big jump in sales, saying it has safeguards to prevent government overreach, without mentioning immigration enforcement efforts in Minnesota that have drawn widespread protests.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称OpenAI对部分英伟达芯片不满意，正在寻找替代方案
item.description: 知情人士透露，OpenAI对英伟达部分最新人工智能芯片不满意，自去年起便寻求替代方案。这一动向可能加剧人工智能浪潮中两大巨头之间的关系复杂化。【原文：OpenAI is unsatisfied with some of Nvidia’s latest artificial intelligence chips, and it has sought alternatives since last year, eight sources familiar with the matter said, potentially complicating the relationship between the two highest-profile players in the AI boom.】

item.title: 波音与通用电气正分析777X发动机潜在的耐久性问题
item.description: 通用电气航空周一表示，正在分析波音777X客机所用GE9X发动机的潜在耐久性问题。【原文：GE Aerospace said on Monday it is analyzing a potential durability issue with the GE9X engine that powers Boeing's 777X.】
